# The `PipelineOptions` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is a convenience struct to hold the parameters necessary for creating the pre-built &quot;default&quot; out-of-order pipeline. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::mca::PipelineOptions</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This is a convenience struct to hold the parameters necessary for creating the pre-built &quot;default&quot; out-of-order pipeline.
